means: 助手，伴侣，配偶（通常指妻子，有时指丈夫）

sentence.Network_en: He drew, or rather dragged off , his ferocious helpmate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把他那怒气冲冲的助手拉开了, 实际上是使劲拖开的.

sentence.Network_en: She is my future stay and helpmate.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是我未来的伴侣和内助.

sentence.Network_en: She had now the right to be his helpmate in his all kind deeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在,她已成了他一切仁慈行为当仁不让的助手.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 盼成为helpmate(配偶) * 我内心ultimate(最终的) * 2.识音标,记单词 classmate n.同班同学。 intimate adj.亲密的, 私人的,隐私的,精湛的;vt.宣布, 通知.
“护士助手(HelpMate)”机器人【11〕(如图I-3(a)),“护士助手”是自主式机器人,它不需要有线制导,也不需要做计划,一旦编好程序,它随时可以完成运送医疗器械.

list.abs: these right people are My helpmates , who continue to participate in working on tasks of Light , including building up the New Earth and helping their fellow men living on the old Earth .这些正义的人们是我的助手，他们继续参与进行光之工作，包括建设新地球和帮助生活在旧地球上他们的人类伙伴。

nursing helpmate robot is a kind of autonomous indoor mobile robot , operating in hospitals , can be applied to promote hospital automation , protect medical care personnel from cross contamination .护士助手机器人是一种在医院环境中工作、自主导航的室内移动机器人。

Eustacia accepts Clym's marriage proposal on condition that he will return to Paris with her but Clym wants to find a helpmate to educate the heathy people with him .游苔莎接受了克林的求婚，因为她以为克林会带她回到巴黎。然而克林是想要寻找一个帮手，和他一起对当地无知的居民进行教化。
pretty lady , is gentleman ' s good helpmate ., 美女 , 是君子的好伴侣.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (as helpmeet): from an erroneous reading of Gen. 2:18, 20, where Adam's future wife is described as ‘an help meet for him’ (i.e. a suitable helper for him). The variant helpmate came into use in the early 18th cent

entry.tran: （尤指负责做饭、清洁等枯燥工作的）帮手，助手
entry.def: If you say that one person is another person's helpmate, you mean that they help the other person in their life or work, especially by doing boring but necessary jobs for them such as cooking and cleaning.

auth_sentence.content: Eve as afterthought and helpmate is insulting and absurd.
